titleStmt.title: Loyalties tears flowing after the bloud of the royall sufferer Charles I. &c. Englands glory and shame. By J.B.
titleStmt.author: Birkenhead, John, Sir, 1616-1679.
Barlow, James, 17th cent, attributed name.

notesStmt.note: An eight page advertisement (sig. A) is appended: "Courteous reader, these books following are printed for Humphrey Moseley, ..".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
